obs.answerLabels: Initial Screening,Rescreening at 5years,Cancer Suspect investigation and Management,Post treatment follow up at 6 weeks,Post treatment follow up at 1 year,Other
NEG - Negative, POS - Positive, ND - Not Done
No SCJ,Cancer suspect,Onset of Menstrual periods,No supplies/equipment,Refused
NEG - Negative, POS - Positive, CaCx - Cancer suspect
N - Normal, LG - Low grade, HG - High grade, US = Unsatisfactory

NILM - NEGATIVE for Intra-epithelial Lesion or Malignancy, LSIL - POSITIVE (Low grade Squamous Intra-epithelial Lesion), HSIL - POSITIVE (High grade Squamous Intra-epithelial Lesion), CaSus - Suspicious of Cancer

CIN1 - Cervical Intra-epithelial Neoplasia 1, CIN2 - Cervical Intra-epithelial Neoplasia 2, CIN3 - Cervical Intra-epithelial Neoplasia 3, CaCx - Invasive Cancer, Normal - No Malignancy seen, ASCUS - Atypical Squamous Cells of Undermined Significancy, ASC-H - Atypical Squamous Cells of High grade
1- Lack of supplies, 2- Health worker capacity,3- Client related,4- Others
1.HIV Testing Services, 2.ART services,3.Family planning,4.Breast Cancer Screening,5.NCDs (Hypertension, Diabetes, Mental Health etc)
1.LEEP, 2.AP Smear,3.Colposcopy and Biopsy,4.Cryotherapy/Thermablation,5.Uncertain VIA management,6.Cancer Suspect,7.Others specify
